message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $100 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's an excellent investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience. I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $95. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.
